title: Bugsy Malone Typeface
content:
Hi,

I am looking for a font similar to the on used in the Bugsy Malone movie poster

- any help would be greatly appreciated

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130131011041/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_1.jpg) | 23.43 KB |
author: perkynana

comments.content:
Bernhard Fashion

something from Nick Curtis  
 [http://www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/curtis/pages/a.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20130131011041/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/curtis/pages/a.htm "http://www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/curtis/pages/a.htm")

[ITC Vintage](http://web.archive.org/) is similar, but I don't think anything mentioned so far has been identical.

- Mike Yanega
